context.p: The DLL Injection Protection provides protection against DLL hijacking attacks.

step.cmd: Click the Agents tab in the top navigation bar of the StellarOne web console.
Click the All group on the Agents screen.
The Agents screen displays a list of agents managed by StellarOne. Navigate to the target agent or agent group and click the Policy Inheritance link.
Scroll down and find the DLL Injection Protection section at the left side of the screen.
Click the toggle Enable DLL Injection Protection to enable it.
